Ivy

Ivy has 17 years teaching experience in China and US, meeting all Washington state qualifications of early learning provider and a ECE certificated teacher. She is very passionate about childcare. Children always feel secure and loved being with Ivy “lao shi”.

Lina

Lina has 7 years' experience as an early learning educator, meeting all Washington state qualifications of early learning provider, and a ECE certificated teacher. She always inspires children's optimism and exploration, preparing them to be a life-long learner.

Jing

Jing has joined us since 2022 as a 5-year's mother, meeting all Washington state qualifications of early learning provider. She practices the positive guidance helping children to form good habits and desirable behaviors.
